verbose_text: Our data show that P-gp co-localized with ClC-3 at the rear of migrating cell and indicate that P-gp may modulate retraction in migrating cells via I Cl, vol and RVD by phosphorylating ClC-3.
evidence: P-gp co-localized with ClC-3 at the rear of migrating cell and indicate that P-gp may modulate retraction in migrating cells via I Cl,vol  and RVD by phosphorylating ClC-3
